directions: Heat a saucepan over medium heat; add brown sugar, water, salt, and figs. Cook and stir until sugar has dissolved and figs have softened, about 10 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in vanilla extract. Cool for 5 minutes.
Place cream cheese on a platter; pour fig mixture over cream cheese.
ingredients: 2 cups fresh figs, stemmed and quartered
title: Zurie's Fresh Fig Compote Over Cream Cheese
